Class DBConnection

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.DBConnection
public class DBConnection extends Object
This class manages the connection to the database. It provides methods to establish and close a connection to the MySQL database. The connection is established lazily and reused throughout the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBConnection

      public DBConnection()
      Constructor that initializes the connection to the database. It calls the connect method to establish a connection when an instance is created.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      private static void connect()
      Establishes a connection to the database if not already connected. The connection is established lazily when needed.

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      Provides the connection to the database. If the connection is not already established, it calls the connect method to ensure the connection is active.
      Returns:
      The active database connection.

    • disconnect

      private static void disconnect()
      Closes the database connection if it is open. This method is called to clean up resources when the connection is no longer needed.
